===Pronoun===
{{zh-pronoun}}

# {{lb|zh|Cantonese|vernacular}} [[they]], [[them]]
#: {{zh-x|佢哋 係 學生。|They are students.|C-GZ}}
#: {{zh-x|唔好 摸 啲 老鼠 啦，佢哋 咁{gam3} 污糟邋{laat6}遢{taat3}。|Don't touch the rats; they are so dirty.|C-GZ}}

====Usage notes====
Use of this word is limited to the {{w|Yue Chinese#Dialects|Guangfu dialects}} of [[Cantonese]], notably the [[Guangzhou]], [[Foshan]] and [[Hong Kong]] dialects. It is not used in most other Cantonese dialects, including the nearby {{w|Siyi dialect}}. For example, the {{w|Taishanese}} word for "they" is {{zh-l|𠊬|tr={{IPAchar|/kʰiak̚²¹/}}}}.
